name: Set Package Mirror
description: Configure package manager mirrors for Alpine Linux (apk) or Debian/Ubuntu (apt). If mirrors are not set, default repositories will be used.

parameters.name: OS Type
parameters.description: Operating system type: 'alpine' for Alpine Linux (apk) or 'debian'/'ubuntu' for Debian/Ubuntu (apt).

parameters.name: Alpine Mirror
parameters.description: Alpine Linux APK mirror URL (e.g., 'http://dl-cdn.alpinelinux.org/alpine'). If empty, default repositories will be used. Should include base URL without version/repository path.

parameters.name: Debian Mirror
parameters.description: Debian/Ubuntu APT mirror URL (e.g., 'http://deb.debian.org/debian'). If empty, default repositories will be used.

commands.description: Configure package manager mirrors based on OS type
